StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPoolDischargeList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileId uniqueidentifier, @Year int, @Month int
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @BeginDate nvarchar(10); DECLARE @EndDate nvarchar(10);
IF @Month < 1 OR @Month > 12 -- whole Fiscal Year BEGIN SET @BeginDate = CONVERT(nvarchar(4), @Year-1) + '-10-1'; SET @EndDate = CONVERT(nvarchar(4), @Year) + '-9-30'; END ELSE -- just one month BEGIN SET @BeginDate = CONVERT(nvarchar(4), @Year)+ '-' + CONVERT(nvarchar(2), @Month) + '-1';
IF @Month = 1 OR @Month = 3 OR @Month = 5 OR @Month = 7 OR @Month = 8 OR @Month = 10 OR @Month = 12 SET @EndDate = CONVERT(nvarchar(4), @Year)+ '-' + CONVERT(nvarchar(2), @Month) + '-31'; ELSE IF @Month = 2 BEGIN IF (@Year % 4 = 0 AND @Year % 100 != 0) OR (@Year % 4 = 0 AND @Year % 100 = 0 AND @Year % 400 = 0) SET @EndDate = CONVERT(nvarchar(4), @Year)+ '-' + CONVERT(nvarchar(2), @Month) + '-29'; ELSE SET @EndDate = CONVERT(nvarchar(4), @Year)+ '-' + CONVERT(nvarchar(2), @Month) + '-28'; END ELSE SET @EndDate = CONVERT(nvarchar(4), @Year)+ '-' + CONVERT(nvarchar(2), @Month) + '-30'; END
SELECT RecruiterId INTO #TrainingFile FROM USMC.TrainingFile WHERE ID = @TrainingFileId
SELECT RTrim(p.Last_Name) + ', ' + RTrim(p.First_Name) AS Name, c.Discharge_Date, dr.Discharge_Reason FROM MCRISS.dbo.Person AS p INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MARINE_CANDIDATE AS mc ON p.PERSON_ID = mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON mc.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT AS c ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.DISCHARGE_REASON dr on dr.DISCHARGE_CODE = c.DISCHARGE_CODE INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs on n.NWA_ID = cs.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Status_Disposi.on AS sd on sd.Disposi.on_Code = cs.Disposi.on_Code AND sd.Status_Code = cs.Status_Code AND sd.Status_Type = cs.Status_Type AND sd.Status_Type = cs.Status_Type INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MARINE AS m ON n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID=m.MARINE_ID INNER JOIN #TrainingFile . ON m.rowguid=..RecruiterID WHERE c.Discharge_Date BETWEEN @BeginDate AND @EndDate AND sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION='DEP DISCHARGE'
ORDER BY p.Last_Name, p.First_Name
DROP TABLE #TrainingFile
END
